wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Alexander Sinclair,  (29 May 1897 – 22 March 1977) was a British Army general who was head of the Secret Intelligence Service (SIS) from 1953 to 1956.

response: *Major General John Alexander Sinclair, C.B., O.B.E.; late Royal Regiment of Artillery. For official services.
*Major-General (temporary) John Alexander Sinclair, OBE (6886), late Royal Artillery.
*Major (Brevet Lieutenant Colonel) John Alexander Sinclair, Royal Artillery.
